mapper.sql: daid, dacname, daturnover, datime, dabusiness, dasuperiority, dainforiority, dasort, empcount, buildtime, remark, daother
mapper.insert:
insert into datacollect
daid,
dacname,
daturnover,
datime,
dabusiness,
dasuperiority,
dainforiority,
dasort,
empcount,
buildtime,
remark,
daother,
#{daid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dacname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{daturnover,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{datime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{dabusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dasuperiority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dainforiority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dasort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{empcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{buildtime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{daother,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update datacollect
dacname = #{dacname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
daturnover = #{daturnover,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
datime = #{datime,jdbcType=DATE},
dabusiness = #{dabusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dasuperiority = #{dasuperiority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dainforiority = #{dainforiority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dasort = #{dasort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
empcount = #{empcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
buildtime = #{buildtime,jdbcType=DATE},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
daother = #{daother,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where daid = #{daid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update datacollect set dacname = #{dacname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, daturnover = #{daturnover,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, datime = #{datime,jdbcType=DATE}, dabusiness = #{dabusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dasuperiority = #{dasuperiority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dainforiority = #{dainforiority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dasort = #{dasort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, empcount = #{empcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, buildtime = #{buildtime,jdbcType=DATE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, daother = #{daother,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where daid = #{daid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select.if: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM datacollect ORDER BY datime DESC) a GROUP BY dacname
SELECT * FROM datacollect WHERE dacname=#{info} AND daid!=#{eid};
select * from datacollect where dacname='浪潮集团'
